data.name: Sentinel
data.description: A robot created for the purpose of hunting and exterminating Mutants, the Sentinel summons reinforcements to overwhelm their prey.

starItems.name: Sentinel
starItems.description: A robot created for the purpose of hunting and exterminating Mutants, the Sentinel summons reinforcements to overwhelm their prey.

2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies or self

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies or self.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies or self.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> random <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies or self

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> random <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies or self.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> random <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies or self.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies.

1.description: Summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Attack primary target for 100% damage. Apply Deflect to self and all ORCHIS allies. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword)
1.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies

2.description: Summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Attack primary target for 100% damage. Apply Deflect and Defense Up to self and all ORCHIS allies. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword)

3.description: Summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Attack primary target for 100% damage + Bonus Attack for 100% damage. Apply Deflect and Defense Up to self and all ORCHIS allies. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword)

4.description: Summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Attack primary target for 150% damage + Bonus Attack for 100% damage. Apply Deflect and Defense Up to self and all ORCHIS allies. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword)

5.description: Summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Attack primary target for 150% damage + Bonus Attack 2 times for 100% damage. Apply Deflect and Defense Up to self and all ORCHIS allies. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword)
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary attack
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description: Summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Attack primary target for 250% damage + Bonus Attack 2 times for 100% damage. Apply Defense Up for 2 turns and Deflect to self and all ORCHIS allies. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword)

7.description: Summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Attack primary target for 250% damage + Bonus Attack 3 times for 100% damage. Apply Defense Up for 2 turns and 2 Deflect to self and all ORCHIS allies. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword)

1.description: Summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Attack primary and adjacent targets for 120% damage + apply Offense Down. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword) This attack is Unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

2.description: Summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Attack primary and adjacent targets for 150% damage + apply Offense Down. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword) This attack is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

3.description: Summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Attack primary and adjacent targets for 180% damage + apply Offense Down. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword) This attack is Unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage per Sentinel Reinforcement ally

4.description: Summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Attack primary and adjacent targets for 210% damage + apply Offense Down. This attack gains +25% damage per Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword) This attack is Unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

5.description: Summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Attack primary and adjacent targets for 240% damage + apply Offense Down. This attack gains +25% damage per Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword) This attack is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage per Sentinel Reinforcement ally

6.description: Summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Attack primary and adjacent targets for 300% damage + apply Offense Down. This attack gains +50% damage per Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword) This attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade: Always summon <color=#86e619>1</color> Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) ally and <color=#86e619>1</color> Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword) ally

7.description: Summon 1 Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) ally and 1 Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword) ally. Attack primary and adjacent targets for 300% damage + apply Offense Down. This attack gains +50% damage per Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword) This attack is Unavoidable.

1.description: On Spawn and on Revive, summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword)
1.nextUpgrade: On this character's first turn, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>

2.description: On Spawn and on Revive, summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword) On this character's first turn, gain Taunt.
2.nextUpgrade: On this character's first turn, gain <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>

3.description: On Spawn and on Revive, summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword) On this character's first turn, gain Taunt and Safeguard.
3.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies, enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>

4.description: On Spawn and on Revive, summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword) On this character's first turn, gain Taunt and Safeguard. In RAIDS, if this character has 4 or more ORCHIS allies, enemies cannot gain Deathproof.
4.nextUpgrade: On this character's first turn, apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ORCHIS</color> allies

5.description: On Spawn and on Revive, summon 1 random Sentinel Reinforcement ally. Possible Summons: > Sentinel Reinforcement (Gun) > Sentinel Reinforcement (Sword) On this character's first turn: > Gain Taunt. > Apply Safeguard for 2 turns to self and all ORCHIS allies. In RAIDS, if this character has 4 or more ORCHIS allies, enemies cannot gain Deathproof.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.
